DOC.brief_summary: Confirmation efficacy safety acoustic CR®-neuromodulation treatment chronic tinnitus patient use CE mark ANM T30 CR®-system real life outpatient set . - Identification early indicator therapy success - Comparison different patient group regard : tinnitus severity , tinnitus duration , level hearing loss , stimulation pattern , unilateral monotonal vs. complex form - Representative set safety data broad patient spectrum - Measurement tinnitus burden ( TBF-12 Questionnaire ) - Generation longterm compliance data
DOC.brief_title: Acoustic Coordinated Reset ( CR® ) Neuromodulation Treatment Chronic Tonal Tinnitus ( `` RESET Real Life '' )
DOC.criteria: Main symptomatic subjective tonal chronical ( > 3 month ) tinnitus < 60dB hearing loss men woman ≥18 year old Main serious neurologic psychiatric internistic disease objective tinnitus Morbus Menière craniomandibular trigger tinnitus
